headline: 2025-10-27 — The energy-systems paper authors defined a unified interaction variable that quantifies instantaneous active power in watts (W) and generalized reactive power in volt‑ampere reactive (VAR).

2025-10-28 — The same authors proposed a multi-layer distributed output-feedback design that issues intermediate reactive-power control commands (measured in VAR) to lower-layer physical controllers, implemented via Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) or Sliding Mode Control (SMC).

2025-10-29 — The authors illustrated the proposed control approach on a simple RLC circuit with a controllable voltage source, applying voltage control inputs measured in volts (V) to validate stability and feasibility of the design.

2025-10-30 — The quadcopter (thrust-vectoring UAV) paper authors implemented quaternion state-feedback to compute motor and rotor-tilt commands, producing rotor-tilt setpoints in degrees (°) and thrust-allocation outputs in newtons (N) to avoid gimbal lock and enable large-attitude hovering.
